title: True horror
review: When thought about this film takes you to places you do not wish to be. True horror. Amazing.

title: Head space aligned
review: This movie understands the horror of loss and shows a journey to ultimate release. It may not be to everyone's taste but rest assured it a dense fulfilling movie. Bad reviews are simply looking for a different movie. If your looking for a wonderfully disturbing film which if invested in will reward for a long time after then look no further.
